content: Hi all, for the upcoming 2019 DevDays event how will the session videos plan to be distributed? Is there an attendee exclusivity period, or will they become publicly available resources shortly after the event?

All sessions will be recorded. Attendees receive a pw for access. All content is released for the world after 6 months (next edition of DevDays). The youtube channel is here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH1DB1ZJbUdC5DOn110lZ_Q/featured
